title: someone hacked my bothers league of legends account...
body: so my brothers league account IGN: thats burnt was hacked and i saw somebody was playing on it while my brother was sleeping. he tried sending a ticket but nothing happened, how can he get his account back?

replies.body: He's going to need to talk with the account agents in his ticket! They'll be able to verify him as the account creator and repair any damage that might have happened!
